actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Energy Research and Development.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Energy Research and Development

official_title: A bill to provide a method underwhich the state of New Mexico can continue certain federal highway road work.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Energy to enter into an agreement with the State of New Mexico to reimburse it for costs incurred for the design, row acquisition, construction, and upgrading of certain transportation routes for radioactive waste generated during defense-related activities and destined for the Waste Isolation Pilot Project.

titles.title: A bill to provide a method underwhich the state of New Mexico can continue certain federal highway road work.
